comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Southend (a resort on the Thames Estuary, northeast of London, and in the county of Essex) now has a Western Esplanade and an Eastern Esplanade. It is likely that these have replaces the East and West Parades. See maps.google.com/maps?q=southend+on+sea&ll=51.53363,0....
